Refuses [ICON_GOLD] Gold gifts
[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]This City State has a diplomatic marriage with {1_CivName} and refuses to accept any [ICON_GOLD] Gold gifts from other Civilizations.[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]You have been allied with this City State long enough to arrange a diplomatic marriage. They will refuse to accept any [ICON_GOLD] Gold gifts from other Civilizations.[ENDCOLOR]
